026package org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.formats.html;
027
028import java.util.List;
029
030import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.formats.html.markup.ContentBuilder;
031import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.formats.html.markup.Head;
032import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.formats.html.markup.HtmlAttr;
033import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.formats.html.markup.HtmlDocument;
034import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.formats.html.markup.HtmlStyle;
035import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.formats.html.markup.HtmlTree;
036import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.formats.html.markup.Script;
037import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.formats.html.markup.TagName;
038import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.formats.html.markup.Text;
039import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.Content;
040import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.util.DocFile;
041import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.util.DocFileIOException;
042import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.util.DocPath;
043import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.util.DocPaths;
044
045/**
046 * Writes a file that tries to redirect to an alternate page.
047 * The redirect uses JavaScript, if enabled, falling back on
048 * {@code <meta http-equiv=refresh content="0,<uri>">}.
049 * If neither are supported/enabled in a browser, the page displays the
050 * standard "JavaScript not enabled" message, and a link to the alternate page.
051 */
052public class IndexRedirectWriter extends HtmlDocletWriter {
053
054    public static void generate(HtmlConfiguration configuration)
055            throws DocFileIOException {
056        generate(configuration, DocPaths.INDEX, configuration.topFile);
057    }
058
059    public static void generate(HtmlConfiguration configuration,
060            DocPath fileName, DocPath target)
061            throws DocFileIOException {
062        IndexRedirectWriter indexRedirect
063            = new IndexRedirectWriter(configuration, fileName, target);
064        indexRedirect.generateIndexFile();
065    }
066
067    private DocPath target;
068
069    private IndexRedirectWriter(HtmlConfiguration configuration,
070            DocPath filename, DocPath target) {
071        super(configuration, filename);
072        this.target = target;
073    }
074
075    /**
076     * Generate an index file that redirects to an alternate file.
077     * @throws DocFileIOException if there is a problem generating the file
078     */
079    private void generateIndexFile() throws DocFileIOException {
080        Head head = new Head(path, configuration.getDocletVersion(),
081            configuration.getBuildDate())
082                .setTimestamp(!options.noTimestamp())
083                .setDescription("index redirect")
084                .setGenerator(getGenerator(getClass()))
085                .setStylesheets(configuration.getMainStylesheet(), List.of()) // avoid
086                                                                              // reference
087                                                                              // to
088                                                                              // default
089                                                                              // stylesheet
090                .addDefaultScript(false);
091
092        String title = (options.windowTitle().length() > 0)
093            ? options.windowTitle()
094            : resources.getText("doclet.Generated_Docs_Untitled");
095
096        head.setTitle(title)
097            .setCharset(options.charset())
098            .setCanonicalLink(target);
099
100        String targetPath = target.getPath();
101        Script script = new Script("window.location.replace(")
102            .appendStringLiteral(targetPath, '\'')
103            .append(")");
104        var metaRefresh = new HtmlTree(TagName.META)
105            .put(HtmlAttr.HTTP_EQUIV, "Refresh")
106            .put(HtmlAttr.CONTENT, "0;" + targetPath);
107        head.addContent(script.asContent(), HtmlTree.NOSCRIPT(metaRefresh));
108
109        ContentBuilder bodyContent = new ContentBuilder();
110        bodyContent.add(HtmlTree.NOSCRIPT(
111            HtmlTree.P(contents.getContent("doclet.No_Script_Message"))));
112
113        bodyContent
114            .add(HtmlTree.P(HtmlTree.A(targetPath, Text.of(targetPath))));
115
116        var body
117            = new HtmlTree(TagName.BODY).setStyle(HtmlStyle.indexRedirectPage);
118        var main = HtmlTree.MAIN(bodyContent);
119        body.add(main);
120
121        HtmlDocument htmlDocument = new HtmlDocument(
122            HtmlTree.HTML(configuration.getLocale().getLanguage(), head, body));
123        htmlDocument.write(DocFile.createFileForOutput(configuration, path));
124    }
125}
